title: Afghanistan news: Taliban says women can attend university, but in segregated classrooms
content:
1. Afghanistan news: Taliban says women can attend university, but in segregated classrooms  The Washington Post
  2. Taliban Say Women Can Study in Gender-Segregated Colleges  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  3. Afghanistan: Taliban announce new rules for female students  BBC News
  4. Jenna Clarke: Women are the big losers as the Taliban robs them of basic human rights  The West Australian
  5. The Taliban set out education policy for women  The Telegraph
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: アフガニスタンのニュースです。タリバン、女性が大学に通えるようになったが、教室は隔離されていると発表
阿富汗新闻。塔利班称妇女可以上大学，但要在隔离的教室里上课
阿富汗新聞。塔利班稱婦女可以上大學，但要在隔離的教室裏上課
